text: The Fourth Estate Public Benefit Corporation (informally called the Fourth Estate) is an American news and journalism organization. It is headquartered in Washington, DC, and is organized as a Public Benefit Cooperative, a type of member social cooperative. Members of the Fourth Estate are both individuals and organizations representing news producers as well as consumers of journalism. == Other websites == * Fourth Estate official website Category:Media in the United States Category:Organizations in Washington, D.C.
title: Fourth Estate Public Benefit Corporation
